articles.title: Trudeau pays respects to Canada heatwave victims
articles.description: Dozens have died as Canada sees a new record - 49.6C (121.3F) - for the third day in a row.
articles.content:
media captionWatch: Canadians say the conditions are "unbearable"
Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has offered condolences to the dozens of people who have died in a record-setting heatwave.
